DESCRIPTION: Create a timeline with the cards played this turn and share #b30% of your current HP to it.
Remove the timeline and return its HP to you.
You cannot play any cards, except those that are auto-played.
Play the timeline's cards at the end of your turn. NL Collapse the timeline when all cards are played.
Cause a timeline to play its cards.
Immediately exhaust this card when drawn.
Add a #yParadox to your hand if this card is played by another card.
This effect only happens if the card is played by a timeline.
Allow a timeline to play more cards at the end of each turn.
A skill card that plays a random attack card from your discard pile, then #yconstructs 1 timeline.
